alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Schenectady; Eastern Ulster; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 3:54AM EST until December 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Litchfield County. In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In New York, southern Herkimer, Fulton, Montgomery, southeast Warren, Saratoga, Schenectady, Albany, Schoharie, Greene, Ulster, and Dutchess Counties. In Vermont, Windham County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and some power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southeast winds are expected into Friday morning, shifting into the west southwest behind a cold front Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
